com.atlassian.clover.ant.tasks

Class CloverReportTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • com.atlassian.clover.ant.tasks.AbstractCloverTask
          • com.atlassian.clover.ant.tasks.CloverReportTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloverHtmlReportTask, CloverPdfReportTask

    public class CloverReportTask
extends AbstractCloverTask
    The Clover report task serves as a driver for the various different clover reporting formats
    Since:
    Clover 1.1
